auth.dataWillBeDeleted: All your data will be permanently deleted.

home.title: Learn Music Your Way
home.subtitle: Interactive music learning with real-time feedback
home.heroSubtitle: The ear training app for serious musicians. Practice on keyboard, guitar, or bass with instant feedback.
home.featuresTitle: Everything you need to train your ear
home.featuresSubtitle: Powerful tools designed to help you become a better musician through active listening and practice.
home.ctaDescription: Join musicians who are improving their ear training skills every day. No signup required.

melodyTraining.title: Melody Training
melodyTraining.description: Generate random melodies and train your ear to recognize notes, intervals, and patterns.

realtimeFeedback.title: Real-time Feedback
realtimeFeedback.description: Use your microphone to get instant feedback on your pitch accuracy as you play or sing.

multiInstrument.title: Multiple Instruments
multiInstrument.description: Practice with piano keyboard, guitar, or bass. Switch between instruments anytime.

scalesChords.title: Scales & Chords
scalesChords.description: Explore 50+ scales and chord types. Visualize fingerings and hear how they sound.

classroom.title: Classroom Mode
classroom.description: Create and assign lessons to students. Track progress and provide structured learning.

progress.title: Track Progress
progress.description: See your improvement over time with detailed performance metrics and history.

sandbox.title: Sandbox Mode
sandbox.description: Explore scales, chords, and melodies at your own pace

instruments.title: Multiple Instruments
instruments.description: Practice with piano, guitar, and bass

sandbox.title: Sandbox
sandbox.melodySetup: I have set up a melody for you to attempt
sandbox.octaveRangeTooltip: Select which octaves are visible in the keyboard interface
sandbox.bpmTooltip: Specify the speed of the melody (BEATS PER MINUTE)
sandbox.beatsTooltip: Specify the number of beats within the melody
sandbox.chordModeTooltip: Select how chords should be used in the melody. Arpeggiator - Use individual chord notes. Progression - Use entire chords

classroom.title: Classroom
classroom.subtitle: Structured lessons and courses for learning music theory
classroom.enterCode: X X X X X X
classroom.enterDescription: Describe what this class is about (optional)
classroom.publicDescription: Public - Anyone can see and join this class
classroom.privateDescription: Private - Only users with the class code can join
classroom.noClassesDescription: Join an existing class or create your own to get started
classroom.noClassesJoined: You haven't created or joined any classes yet.
classroom.noPublicClasses: No public classes yet. Be the first to create one!
classroom.transcriptPlaceholder: e.g. try out this C Major scale exercise
classroom.loginToJoin: Log in to join a classroom
classroom.loginToCreate: Log in to create a classroom
classroom.invalidCode: Invalid class code. Please check and try again.
classroom.alreadyMember: You are already a member of this class

errors.networkError: Network error. Please check your connection.
errors.unauthorized: You are not authorized to perform this action
errors.usernameTooShort: Username must be at least 3 characters
errors.usernameTooLong: Username must be 20 characters or less
errors.usernameInvalidChars: Only letters, numbers, and underscores allowed
errors.accountCreatedSuccess: Account created successfully! Logging you in...
errors.accountCreatedLoginFailed: Account created but login failed. Please sign in manually.
errors.deleteAccountFailed: Failed to delete account. Please try again or contact support.

passwordStrength.weak: Weak - needs uppercase, lowercase, and number
passwordStrength.medium: Medium - add a special character for extra security

errorBoundary.title: Oops! Something went wrong
errorBoundary.message: We're sorry, but something unexpected happened while making music.

protectedRoute.signInToAccess: Please sign in to access the site.

notFound.title: Page Not Found
notFound.message: Looks like this page hit a wrong note! The page you're looking for doesn't exist or has been moved.
notFound.tipMessage: Use the navigation menu above to explore our pages!
